snippet: Colleges have begun to notice Sayreville’s football team, but with no more games this fall after seven players were arrested, the seniors have no way to demonstrate their skills.
abstract: Cancellation of Sayreville War Memorial High School's football season amid criminal hazing and sex abuse allegations leaves college recruiters without much film or scouting reporting to work with, making it hard for players hoping to play college football to leave a lasting impression.
lead_paragraph: Colleges have begun to notice Sayreville’s football team, but with no more games this fall after seven players were arrested, the seniors have no way to demonstrate their skills.

headline.main: With Season Canceled, Sayreville’s Players Vanish Before Recruiters
headline.print_headline: With Season Canceled, Sayreville’s Players Vanish Before Recruiters

keywords.value: Sayreville War Memorial High School (Sayreville, NJ)
keywords.name: organizations
